name: Datadog RUM Session Replay 最小
description: RUM のセッションリプレイを有効化する最小例

files.template:
<!doctype html>
<html><body><script src='https://www.datadoghq-browser-agent.com/datadog-rum.js'></script><script>window.DD_RUM && DD_RUM.init({ applicationId: 'app', clientToken: 'token', site: 'datadoghq.com', service: 'web', env: 'dev', sessionReplaySampleRate: 100, trackInteractions: true });</script></body></html>
